title: New Holland Brewing
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Southwest Michigan is not always a haven for the vegans, but this place offers local vegan beers and spirits, hummus, salads, vegan sandwich options, and pizza can be made vegan by omitting cheese (no vegan cheese). Emphasis on local ingredients. Lively atmosphere.
